name: One and the same
description:
Play in fullscreen for a better experience

Human vision can be deceiving... if your eyes can't tell objects apart, the game won't either.

Made for the Mini Jam 111: Colors2.

Controls

You move, all blocks in the scene, with WASD.

Fill up the area with the dotted lines with blocks to win!

If you get stuck you can always press R to restart the level.

Although the game is quite short, its a fun and scalable prototype I hope to extend!

Credits
  • Music from OpenGameArt.org: 
    • "Another space background track" by axtoncrolley
  • SFX from OpenGameArt.org:
    • Victory jingle by ViRiX Dreamcore
  • Font : want_coffee
